cz.cuni.mff.kocur.graphics

Interface Buildable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BuildableJPanel, ConfigurationEntry, ConfigurationPanel, ConsolePanel, DecisionPanel, LoggingTab, MainBody, MainBotConfiguration, MainBotConfigurationEntry, MainBotInfoEntry, MainRunningInfo, StreamsPanel, WindowedJPanel

    public interface Buildable
    I need graphical objects to be able to build themselves. For example during construction I need the ConfigurationPanel to be created, but I want it to build after I have some configurations to display.
    So this interface should ensure there is a build() method to call, as well as a way how to get reference to the component.
    Author:
    kocur

      • getComponent

        java.awt.Component getComponent()
                         throws ComponentNotBuiltException
        Returns:
        Returns the reference to component that is beeing displayed. (So the cast should be done inside graphic classes)
        Throws:
        ComponentNotBuiltException - Thrown if this component haven't been built yet before.

      • get

        Buildable get()
       throws ComponentNotBuiltException
        Returns reference to this.
        Returns:
        Buildable object.
        Throws:
        ComponentNotBuiltException - If this component haven't been built prior to getting it.
